readable.title: 3591458156_f1a9a33918
readable.content: A cowboy gets kicked off a horse that is bucking A cowboy is thrown from the horse he was riding , while the judge stands by with his hand on a yellow flag . A man at a rodeo is thrown off a horse . The horse is kicking up its hind legs at the cowboy whist another man stands ad watches . Two men in western attire with a brown horse kicking into the air .
